title: New iPad Pro (2018) release date, specs, price, latest rumours and news
description:
![new ipad pro 2018
models](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**Apple’s unveiled two super swish new iPad Pros jam packed with new features
that look awesome for creatives. Here’s everything you need to know about the
new 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9-inch iPad Pro 2018.**

## New Apple iPad Pro 2018 release date – When is the new iPad Pro coming out?

The new iPad Pros will launch alongisde the [new Macbook Air
2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/new-macbook-air-2018-release-
date-3433474) and [new Mac Mini 2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/mac-
mini-2018-pro-release-date-3552537) on 7 November. You can pre-order them now
from the Apple store.

**Related:[Best laptop for students](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
student-laptop-3444216)**

## New Apple iPad Pro 2018 price – How much does the new iPad Pro cost?

You can see a breakdown of the new iPad Pros price in the table below.

**Model** | **64GB** | **256GB** | **512GB** | **1TB** | **LTE**  
---|---|---|---|---|---  
New 11-inch iPad Pro | £769 | £919 | £1119 | £1519 | From £919  
New 12.9-inch iPad Pro | £969 | £1119 | £1319 | £1719 | From £1,119  
  
The new Apple Pencil 2 will set you back £119. The 11-inch iPad Pro keyboard
cover costs £179 and the larger 12.9-inch iPad Pro £199.

**Related:[Best tablets](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
tablet-3438986)**

  * 

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

## New Apple iPad Pro 2018 specs – What’s new in the iPad Pro 2018?

Tim Cook claimed the new iPad Pros are “going to push what we can do on iPad,
or any computer any further.” Both the 11-inch and 12.9-inch iPad Pros feature
completely new designs that aim to reduce their bezel size and modernise the
user experience. By reducing the bezel Apple claims the tablets are the most
compact its ever created and at 5.9mm thick they’re also the thinnest.

As expected neither new iPad Pro 2018 will have a physical home button.
Interactions will be purely touch and gesture based. Both tablets will feature
USB C ports. This will let you do things like attach the iPad to external
displays. There will also be a new charging out feature that lets you use the
iPad Pro 2018 as a battery pack for other devices.

The new [Apple Pencil 2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-
pencil-2-2018-features-3612981) has been redesigned. It now magnetically docks
to the new iPad Pro and wireless charges. There are also new shortcut
features, like double tapping the pencil to switch tools while doodling.

**Related:[Best laptop](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
laptops-3431966)**

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Outside of this both the new 11-inch iPad Pro and new 12.9-inch iPad Pros will
feature LCD Liquid Retina, True Tone screens. Apple claims both screens are
the most accurate and responsive its ever created.

The new iPad Pros will feature FaceID. This will let you secure and unlock
your iPad Pro 2018 using the 7-megapixel front camera. On the rear you’ll find
a single lens 12-megapixel camera.

Under the hood they will run using a new 7nm, eight-core A12X Bionic CPU. The
CPU has more than 10 billion transistors. Apple claims it will offer 35%
faster single core speeds and 90% faster multi-core performance than its
predecessor. Clock speeds were not revealed.

The CPU will have a 7-core Apple designed GPU the company claims is 1000 times
faster than the original iPad. It claims it will let the new iPad Pros offer
“[Xbox One S](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/xbox-one-s) level”
graphics.

The latest generation Neural Engine will also appear on both to help the iPads
deploy machine learning solutions and features, like a new fast storage
controller that let Apple give it 1TB of storage without sacrificing
read/write speeds. Both versions will also be sold with 64GB, 256GB, 512GB and
Gigabit LTE options.

The application offering has also been improved. Apple has worked with Adobe
to create a new version of Photoshop for iOS that is far more similar to the
full fat desktop app than before.

You can see a full breakdown of the two new iPad Pros specs in the tablet
below.

**Model** | **11-inch iPad Pro 2018** | **12.9-inch iPad Pro 2018**  
---|---|---  
**Screen** |  11-inch, 2388 x 1668, 120Hz, 600 nits, True Tone, LCD |
12.9-inch, 2732 x 2048, 120Hz, 600 nits, True Tone, LCD  
**CPU** |  A12X Bionic chip | A12X Bionic chip  
**Graphics** |  Custom 7-core ‘Apple designed’  | Custom 7-core ‘Apple
designed  
**Cameras** |  12-megapixel ƒ/1.8 rear / 7-megapixel front | 12-megapixel
ƒ/1.8 rear / 7-megapixel front  
**Storage** |  64GB/256GBG/512GB/1TB | 64GB/256GBG/512GB/1TB  
**Connectivity** |  USB C | USB C  
**Battery** |  29.37-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery |
36.71-watt-hour rechargeable lithium-polymer battery  
**OS** |  iOS 12 | iOS 12  
  
**Excited about the new iPad Pro 2018? Let us know on Twitter
@TrustedReviews**
